alert.note: Alert for Zapata (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 28 at 9:55PM CDT until April 28 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN ZAPATA COUNTY... At 955 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Morales-Sanchez, or near Lopeno, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Zapata, Lopeno, Medina, New Falcon, Zapata High School, Zapata County Fire Department, Zapata Middle School, Siesta Shores, Zapata County Public Library and Las Palmas. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
